name: Buttered Potato And Carrot
description: This Buttered Potato and Carrot recipe is a perfect addition to your healthy meal plan. It's low in sodium and sugar, making it an excellent choice for those who are mindful about their health. Enjoy a delicious, healthified dish that doesn't compromise on flavor.

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the Baby Potatoes under cold water and scrub any dirt off their skins.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Peel the Carrots and then slice them into rounds about 1/4 inch thick.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium pot, bring salted water to a boil and add the Baby Potatoes. Cook them for about 15 minutes until tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the sliced Carrots to the pot with the Baby Potatoes and cook for an additional 10 minutes until the carrots are tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Drain the water from the pot and return the cooked Potatoes and Carrots to the pot.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the Butter and dried Thyme leaves to the Potatoes and Carrots. Stir over low heat until the vegetables are evenly coated with the butter and herbs.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve warm as a side dish to your favorite main course.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
